Detailed Description

Full-size two dimensional Hough space for line detection of image.

Stores accumulator cells.

This class is part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.

Author:
Qinyin Zhou <qinyin@mip.sdu.dk>
See also:
CHoughSHTLine
Version:
0.99

ipl::CHoughSpace2D::CHoughSpace2D (  ostream &    os,
int    ImageWidth,
int    ImageHeight,
int    Thickness,
int    Threshold,
CHoughBase::PARAMETERTYPE    ParamType = CHoughBase::NORMAL_PARAM
) 
 

Constructor for CHoughSpace2D specified for an image and type of parametrization.

Creates a two dimensional Hough space object.

Parameters:
os  Output stream for algorithm information.
mageWidth  Width of the source image object.
mageHeight  Height of the source image object.
Thickness  Thickness of the lines of the source image.
Threshold  Detection threshold.
ParamType  Type of parametrization, slope intercept or normal parametrization. Normal as default.

int    ImageHeight,
int    Thickness,
CHoughBase::PARAMETERTYPE    ParamType = CHoughBase::NORMAL_PARAM
) 
 

ComputeQuantization Computes the size of quantization of the parameter rho for line detection.

Parameters:
ImageWidth  Width of the input image.
ImageHeight  Height of the input image.
Thickness  Thickness of the shapes of the image.
ParamType  Type of parameterization. Normal by default.
Returns :
Quantization of parameters (nRho,nTheta).

int ipl::CHoughSpace2D::GetOffset (  int    i )  const
 

Returns the offset values of the parameters.

Normally when using normal parametrization offset of 2 in theta is deployed.

Parameters:
i  Coordinate of the parameter space.

bool ipl::CHoughSpace2D::Inc (  const CPoint2D< int > &    Position )  [inline, virtual]
 

Increment a accumulator cell at position pos with one.

This function is called for accumulation.

Parameters:
position  Position of the accumulator cell to be incremented.
Returns :
Return true if the score of position has exeeded threshold value. This indicate that a peak may be found.

void ipl::CHoughSpace2D::ToImage (  CStdImage &    outImg )  [virtual]
 

Convert the parameter space to a image.

The space image will be scaled to 8-bit image.

Parameters:
outImg  Image object to be written into.
